ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She laughed.  Yeah.  I like that one.  It fits them to a tee. You know, I wonder, are they really as good as they talk about, or just blowing hot air?

::KitKat::

She laughed.  "Yeah.  I like that one.  It fits them to a tee. You 
know, I wonder, are they really as good as they talk about, or just 
blowing hot air?" She chuckled, "enought hot air to lift a ship off 
the ground."  She laughed.  Those two were abnoxious.
She liked Quictstrike.  She saw him as a mentor more than anything 
else.  She figured she could learn a thing or three from him.  If 
wolves were good a one thing, learning was at the top of her list.  
She was a fast learner.  She figured the more she hung out with him, 
the better she could be.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:

> Quickstrike:
> 
> Quickstrike chuckled at KitKat. "Maybe yer right." He leaned back 
and 
> watched as she threw up another rock and fired at it. Now it was 
his turn. 
> He wasn't that into it. After she threw another into the air, he 
waited 
> until it was a few inches from the ground, then he fired. The rock 
split 
> into two, and pieces shattered from the side as they both hit the 
ground. It 
> wasn't his best, but it wasn't a real enemy. He was used to 
fighting with 
> other bots, even to spar with.
> 
> He wanted to do something to entertain himself. KitKat kept him 
occupied. At 
> least she tried for conversation. He grin appeared on his mouth 
plate. "Ah 
> gotta idea, let' give Sinester and Sinesis uh nickname. Ah'm 
bettin' on Dumb 
> and Dumber."
>
